events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product does not meet my expectations.
The case has been reviewed and classified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
A customer support agent specializing in refund cases has been assigned to handle this request promptly.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the wrong item you received. I'm here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item I received which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to receiving the return label.
The refund process has been completed and the return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send back the incorrect item and if your refund was received without any issues.
Yes, I mailed the return yesterday and already saw the refund in my account. Thanks again for your help!
We are glad to hear that everything was resolved smoothly. Closing this case now, and please reach out if you need anything else.
Please take a moment to fill out a short survey about your support experience to help us improve our services.
